page.title: 03Hebridean Herbals
page.content: Hebridean Herbals was originally Coll Herbals and was set up by Wendy Mackenchie in 1975.She started in her own house and in 1979 she moved to the hostel building.(The old Arinogour school).Then Sir Hugh Fraser took over Coll Herbals in 1984. There are now 4 employees including Wendy.They produce products such as: perfume,Bracken After Shave,facial Scrubs Shampoos,Toilet Waters,various other items and small Sachets filled with herbs from Coll. Their products are sent to many of Sir Hugh Fraser's shops in as well as various other countries such as France, Germany, Canada, Australia, the U.S.A. and many other countries, all over the world.
